amendment.description: Amendment increases the level of funding by offset for the United States Olympic Committee's Paralympic Veterans Program by $3.5 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 111-195 to increase the level of funding for the Department of Veterans Affairs, Office of National Veterans' Sports Programs and Special Events by $3,500,000. Would decrease funding for the VA's Medical Support and Compliance account by $3,500,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Filner amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
